Class javachart.chart.RotateString 
All Packages  Class Hierarchy  This Package  Previous  Next  Index

Class javachart.chart.RotateString 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----javachart.chart.RotateString
public class RotateString
extends Object
A class for rotating and otherwise transforming graphics strings. Since Java's Graphics class supports only non-transformed raster strings, the RotateString class accomplishes its work with raster operations.
See Also:
Globals, Gc

RotateString(Component)
Constructs a RotateString class with the specified Component class

drawString(String, int, int, int, Image)
Draws a rotated string at the specified location and angle
getExtent(String, int, int, int, FontMetrics)
Calculates an extent box for the specified String at the specified location and angles.
